label: ReturnableAssetInstructions
comment: The procedures to follow for returnable assets, such as reusable packaging (pallets, crates).

datatypeProperties.comment: An identifier of the material to which these returnable asset instructions apply.
The code specifying the description of the terms and conditions for these returnable asset instructions.
A textual description of the terms and conditions for these returnable asset instructions.

objectProperties.comment: A deposit value specified in these returnable asset instructions.
The specified period during which the deposit value specified in these returnable asset instructions is valid.

referencedBy.comment: Returnable asset instructions for this supply chain packaging.
